dict.string:
cd "$TM_DIRECTORY"
if [[ -z $TM_SELECTED_FILES ]]; then DARCSPaths=`echo \'$TM_FILEPATH\'`; else DARCSPaths="$TM_SELECTED_FILES"; fi export DARCSPaths
"${TM_RUBY:=ruby}" <<'EOF' require 'pathname'
basedir = Pathname.new(ENV['TM_DIRECTORY']).realpath() addlist = Array.new() ENV['DARCSPaths'].split(/' '/).each() { |addfile| addfile = addfile[/^'?(.*?)'?$/, 1] addlist << "'#{Pathname.new(addfile).realpath.relative_path_from(basedir).to_s.gsub(/(')/, "\\\1")}'" } output = `darcs add -v -r #{addlist.join(' ')}` puts(output)
